title: Probability With Apps
description: Topics include conditional probability, density and distribution functions from engineering, expectation, conditional expectation, laws of large numbers, central limit theorem, and introduction to Poisson Processes.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Cannot be enrolled in one of the following Levels:
__HEADER_1__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: MATH 2550 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 2551 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 2561 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or (MATH 2X51 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T and (MATH 1522 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 1553 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 1554 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 1564 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 1X53 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T or MATH 1X54 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T))
